metadata.name: The hope
metadata.description:
A man of icy trees
In the middle of the mountain , naked
He fights for hope
To grow and creation

This cycle (loop)is repeated several times during a person's life.

Music & Sound design by @uwantu 
Software : Maxon Cinema 4D , Octane render , DaVinci Resolve Studio
Resolution : 1842 x2304 (4K UHD)
Original music included
